comments.content: It must be **[Miss Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125549/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Sudtipos&ffam=Miss%20Robertson%20-%20Regular&fid=a57059348836e77dc3d5fad1aeece10d&fsize=60&text=walk%20away%20from%20everuthing&wrap=2)** by Alejandro Paul, Charles P Bluemlein [Sudtipos, 2006]
